article_title: 14 Ways To Avoid The Obamacare Tax (Actually 15 if you include 'brief incarceration')

article_metadata.author: Scott Gottlieb

og.description: There are 14 ways, in all, to avoid paying the Obamacare tax penalty. This fee hits people who don't carry health insurance that conforms to the government regulations. Based on the latest revision to the Obamacare regulations, people can avail themselves of these different off ramps all the way through 2016. Many of [...]
